Containers.Name: rinseaid-transmission-openvpn
Containers.Description: transmission-openvpn is a container which runs the Transmission torrent client with WebUI while connecting to OpenVPN.[br] When using PIA as provider it will update Transmission hourly with assigned open port. Please read the instructions below.[br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where transmission-openvpn will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/data[/b] This is where transmission-openvpn can access torrent data.[br][br] [b]OPENVPN_PROVIDER[/b] Sets the OpenVPN provider to use. Supported providers and their config values are listed in the table below.[br] [b]OPENVPN_USERNAME[/b] Your OpenVPN username[br] [b]OPENVPN_PASSWORD[/b] Your OpenVPN password[br] [b]OPENVPN_CONFIG[/b] Sets the OpenVPN endpoint to connect to. e.g. UK Southampton[br] [b]OPENVPN_OPTS[/b] Will be passed to OpenVPN on startup[br] [b]LOCAL_NETWORK[/b] Sets the local network that should have access. e.g. 192.168.0.0/24. This is needed to access the WebUI, because when the VPN is active, and since docker is running in a different IP range than your client the response to your request will be treated as "non-local" traffic and therefore be routed out through the VPN interface.[br][br] [table] [thead] [tr] [th align="left"]Provider Name[/th] [th align="left"]Config Value[/th] [/tr] [/thead] [tbody] [tr] [td align="left"]Anonine[/td] [td align="left"][code]ANONINE[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]BTGuard[/td] [td align="left"][code]BTGUARD[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]Cryptostorm[/td] [td align="left"][code]CRYPTOSTORM[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]FrootVPN[/td] [td align="left"][code]FROOT[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]FrostVPN[/td] [td align="left"][code]FROSTVPN[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]Giganews[/td] [td align="left"][code]GIGANEWS[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]HideMe[/td] [td align="left"][code]HIDEME[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]HideMyAss[/td] [td align="left"][code]HIDEMYASS[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]IntegrityVPN[/td] [td align="left"][code]INTEGRITYVPN[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]IPVanish[/td] [td align="left"][code]IPVANISH[/code][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td align="left"]Ivacy[/td] [td https://github.com/haugene/docker-transmission-openvpn
Containers.Overview: Transmission is a fast, easy, and free BitTorrent client.[br] This Docker also connects to OpenVPN[br][br]
